name: Rebound (itch) (benjames171)
description:
Rebound is a hybrid game inspired by Titan, Breakout, air hockey and pinball.

The aim of the game is to guide the bat around each level, deflecting the ball into destructible blocks. The level is complete when all the blocks have been destroyed.

There are various hazards and special tiles to hinder and help you along the way.

Further instructions are in the game.

Thanks for playing and have fun!
